content.raw:
To insert Atlas in Gazebo I just needed to include `<install_prefix>/share/` in the `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` in order to load the atlas meshes. I also had to run gzsdf to create the `.sdf` file and create a `model.config`.

If that's expected I'm ready to aprove it.
content.html:
To insert Atlas in Gazebo I just needed to include <install_prefix>/share/ in the GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH in order to load the atlas meshes. I also had to run gzsdf to create the .sdf file and create a model.config.

If that's expected I'm ready to aprove it.
